ing: 1 large ripe avocado, peeled and diced
1 (1 ounce) package French onion soup mix
des: "Creamy avocado dressing, delicious served over lettuce and vine-ripened tomatoes."
ins: Place avocado, sour cream, onion soup mix, garlic, curry powder, and lemon juice into blender container. Blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into glass jar and chill.
